casebody.data:
The RINEX LABORATORIES COMPANY, Pierre Frailey and Arnold Bonbrake, Appellants, v. William H. NOLL, Doing Business Under the Trade Name of The Pinex Company, Appellee. No. 7532. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixlh Circuit. Oct. 14, 1938. James M. McSweeney, of Cleveland, Ohio, and G. Kenneth Brown, of New York City, for appellants. John R. Milburn, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellee.

Before SIMONS, ALLEN, and HAMILTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decree is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion of the District Judge, 25 F.Supp. 239.
